selectedItems.description: Text that displays the number of selected items

currentSelectedItems.description: Text that displays the current selected items

changeSelection.description: Label for the button that opens the dialog to change selection

dialogTitle.description: Title for the dialog to select items

loadingHeader.description: Show loading header while resources uploads

selectedElementRemoveButton.description: Label for the button to remove a selected element

closedButton.description: Label for the closed dialog button

filterOptions.description: Filter elements with a value greater than 10
